amendment.description: To provide that up to $6,000,000 be used for UAS integration activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3679 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3679 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Warner to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5503) To provide that up to $6,000,000 be used for UAS integration activities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3679 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Warner to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3679 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
